data.lyric:
[ti:Take Your Black Bottom Outside (04-27-27)]
[ar:Clarence Williams]
[al:Complete Jazz Series 1927]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take Your Black Bottom Outside (04-27-27) - Clarence Williams
[01:10.43]Take your black bottom dance out of here
[01:12.99]Don't want it in my dance hall
[01:15.73]Take your glass bottom dance out of here
[01:18.52]I can't use that saw
[01:21.43]I must tell you right to your face
[01:23.77]I don't want your black bottom dance in my place
[01:26.25]I got a brand new daddy with a lot of feet
[01:29.26]To teach me all of the new steps that I need
[01:31.50]His style of dancing is a bell
[01:34.55]To sing dap to my house was fright
[01:37.28]You see your black bottom
[01:38.87]Show it was
[01:40.18]Your black bottom dances all you got
[01:42.94]Give me a pain
[01:44.02]I must pay again
[01:45.61]Take your black bottom outside
[01:48.19]
[02:24.98]Take your black bottom dance outside
[02:27.59]Don't want it in my dance hall
[02:29.66]
[02:30.27]Take your glass bottom dance outside
[02:33.08]I can't use that tall
[02:35.87]I must tell you right to your face
[02:38.21]I don't want your black bottom in my face
[02:40.61]Got a brand new daddy with a lot of feet
[02:43.60]To teach me all of the new steps that I need
[02:45.95]His style of dancing is a bell
[02:48.68]To sing dap to my house was fright
[02:51.57]You see your black bottom
[02:52.92]Show it was
[02:54.30]Your black bottom dances all you got
data.trans:
[ti:Take Your Black Bottom Outside (04-27-27)]
[ar:Clarence Williams]
[al:Complete Jazz Series 1927]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[01:10.43]带着你的黑臀舞离开这里
[01:12.99]我不想让它出现在我的舞厅里
[01:15.73]带着你的酒杯离开这里
[01:18.52]我不能用那把锯子
[01:21.43]我必须当面告诉你
[01:23.77]我不想让你在我的地盘上跳舞
[01:26.25]我有了一个全新的爸爸长着许多双脚
[01:29.26]教我所有我需要的新舞步
[01:31.50]他的舞蹈风格令人叹为观止
[01:34.55]唱着欢快的歌来到我的房子吓到了
[01:37.28]你看见你的黑臀
[01:38.87]证明一切
[01:40.18]你的黑臀尽情热舞
[01:42.94]让我痛苦不堪
[01:44.02]我必须再次付出代价
[01:45.61]把你的黑色臀部拿出来
[01:48.19]
[02:24.98]在外面尽情热舞
[02:27.59]我不想让它出现在我的舞厅里
[02:29.66]
[02:30.27]拿着你的酒杯出去跳舞
[02:33.08]我不能用那么高的
[02:35.87]我必须当面告诉你
[02:38.21]我不想让你的臀部在我面前晃来晃去
[02:40.61]我有了一个新爸爸长着一双漂亮的脚
[02:43.60]教我所有我需要的新舞步
[02:45.95]他的舞蹈风格令人叹为观止
[02:48.68]唱着欢快的歌来到我的房子吓到了
[02:51.57]你看见你的黑臀
[02:52.92]证明一切
[02:54.30]你的黑臀尽情热舞
